html:
5.28.17  2:41 am   hey bill I ask a lot of questions that i'm really curious about but you don't answer them. Does an e-mail bother you?

     no, but sometimes the sender gets bothered, because i don't have time to answer them all

5.28.17  2:01 am   A lot of people here ask a lot of philosophical questions about life, but I don't know why. Do you?

     life is pretty important. so i can understand why people want to know about it

5.28.17  1:52 am   will anything performed by the bill wurtz fake jazz ensemble make it to youtube in video format? also i wonder if people know that the jazz page of this website was updated. in 2017, no less!

     i think i put one on youtube on the 4th of july, 2014. but these things are mostly just low key private jams, which i would prefer not to publicize too much

5.28.17  1:52 am   I understood your song "i don't wanna go to school" as mocking moody teenagers who don't appreciate education. Yet all the comments I see on that song are also against education. I am confused, can you clarify please, are you for or against education?

     the song was originally a reaction to the social pressure to attend college. "stupid" is a metaphor for being an independent person, on their own self directed educational track

5.28.17  1:40 am   Can you describe yourself in 3 words?

     describe? forget that, how about i be myself instead

5.28.17  1:40 am   why do you leave some questions shown but unanswered

     i very rarely do that, and the reason is usually obvious. unless it's a mistake

5.28.17  1:19 am   are you a zebra

     i'm not sure
5.28.17  1:15 am   grilled or fried chicken

5.28.17  12:54 am   Who hurt you?

     i don't remember if anyone has

5.28.17  12:46 am   will you release something this Tuesday?

     i will try
5.28.17  12:15 am   Hey nice videos. How big is your cock?

5.28.17  12:10 am   Can you explain demand and supply?

     sure. if people want something, it might be cool to make it because then they will buy it from you

5.28.17  12:03 am   I'm filled to the brim with original and creative ideas but I'm so lazy and also filled to the brim with depression and anxiety that I'm finding that it's near impossible for me to apply these ideas and create things.

     try starting a steady series of small things. it will give you a chance to try a lot of different things, and you can perfect your process

5.27.17  11:45 pm   I just found that there's a semi-hidden nook on my bed where I can hold my water bottle so I can have water handily nearby while I sleep. It makes me very happy. Have you recently discovered any seemingly small quality of life improvements that make you really happy and grateful?

     yes

5.27.17  11:21 pm   dont answer this question

     i will see what i can do

5.27.17  11:12 pm   are you stuck in the past

     no

5.27.17  11:03 pm   If I told you what the exact contents of the last video you would ever make would be, and even showed you a copy of it, would you a) accept that I am you from the future; and b) begin making the video immediately or would you wait? What If I told you to wait 20 years before making it?

     you can try to tell me the future but i can still change it

5.27.17  11:01 pm   what's your opinion on the upcoming uprising of potato memes

     potato memes already arose quite some time ago
5.27.17  10:59 pm   On a scale of 1-10 what's your favourite colour of the alphabet? Hint the correct answer is square.
5.27.17  10:57 pm   i am so lonely what do i do
5.27.17  10:56 pm   Are you going to post more shorts, or just "history of" videos from now on?
5.27.17  10:48 pm   the date and time that is next to the questions are the time that the question was made or the time you answer them?
5.27.17  10:21 pm   what is music?
5.27.17  10:19 pm   what should i do with my life
5.27.17  10:09 pm   Do you buy into any conspiracy theories, or have you ever done so?
5.27.17  9:48 pm   This is so unfortunate that I've asked a lot of important questions but then forget exactly what I asked and can never find them, or never know if you answered them or not.
5.27.17  9:48 pm   do you believe in an afterlife?
5.27.17  9:48 pm   how do I shave my piano

5.27.17  9:47 pm   any tips on how to get through the education system without conforming to it?

     stealth tactics

5.27.17  9:41 pm   Why is the sky blue?

     because the weather is clear

5.27.17  9:34 pm   do you like going outside

     oh hell yeah

5.27.17  9:05 pm   are you having fun in life

     i guess so

     and hanging out with people

     no
5.27.17  9:00 pm   what happens if pinnochio says "my nose will now grow?"
5.27.17  8:45 pm   I see the first question ever asked was on 5.10.15 11:50 pm, and the question was: "where has the fun gone" You replied: "i will check" Have you found it yet?

5.27.17  8:39 pm   Why don't you sell any t-shirts or posters or merch or something?

     i would prefer to focus on other types of content

5.27.17  8:32 pm   have you ever thought of giving up when creating one of your more lengthy and effort consuming videos?

     no

     how do you keep focused on such a long project?

     it helps to be confident in the process, and also confident that that project is the right project to do at that time

5.27.17  8:08 pm   Wanna come over to my house and play some board games and talk about life?

     sure

5.27.17  7:59 pm   I've been trying to crack the code on the "reality" page of your website, watching the videos there, looking at code, converting audio, and it's got me wondering... is there even an answer to the madness that is "reality" because at this point it does not seem so, and i'm beginning to loose hope of something cool to happen, so if you would tell me,that would be amazing...

5.27.17  7:40 pm   Is positivity a good thing?

     i think that's what it means

5.27.17  7:38 pm   how do i even do a thing?

     any way
5.27.17  7:28 pm   Why does the thank you page say 'thabk you?' And why does the question page say 'ueqstions?'

5.27.17  7:06 pm   If the sky's the limit why do I keep hitting my head on the ceiling?

     you have to go outside first
5.27.17  6:59 pm   Why do you make videos?

5.27.17  6:21 pm   do you ever wish people would pay more attention to your songs as opposed to your history videos, or is it all good?

     most of my songs haven't been made yet. i've barely even started

5.27.17  6:17 pm   about when was "It's Gonna Be Alright" written?

     started 2011, and various updates in 2012 and 2013, i think

5.27.17  6:09 pm   are you a banana

     i'm not sure

5.27.17  5:58 pm   whats a door?

     a person shaped hole in the wall

5.27.17  5:47 pm   What is your e-mail for?

     sending and receiving messages. perhaps there are other uses for it, i'm not sure

5.27.17  5:41 pm   Can you add some rewards on your patreon page?

     maybe, but i don't want to

5.27.17  5:10 pm   I often fear that I'm not phrasing things in an understandable way, and then I go overboard with the explanations and sometimes even make it worse and unnecessarily complicated. I really wish I could express myself in a lot simpler way, but it seems so difficult, for some reason? Any suggestions on how I can work on this

     try shorter! and it's also good to leave it 20% unclear on purpose, for good luck
